name: business_phone_search
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool data_axle_business_phone_search.
Tool description: Find relevant businesses by phone number.
API description: Search for relevant businesses in the Data Axle database based on the given parameters.

limit.description: The maximum number of results to return.

query.description: The search query for finding businesses.

packages.description: The specific data packages to include in the search.
